name: Galaxia 7
overview: A group of interplanetary terrorist has undermined all the Plutamnite mines of the planet Galaxia 7, the only one in the entire galaxy where this important mineral can be found. The bomb system installed by the terrorists is very special: to disable it, it is necessary to find the numerous objects scattered in the various mines to use them in defusing the box. Therefore, certain that their devices will not be able to be disabled in the time left before the explosion. The terrorists have disclosed the news in order to obtain the maximum impact on public opinion. But the last word has not yet been said. There is only one person capable of attempting such an arduous undertaking: is it you? Published under the name Plutamnite in Game 2000 Nuova serie n.24 (Gennaio 1990.
